headline: ITW Schedules First Quarter 2025 Earnings Webcast
summary: GLENVIEW, Ill., April 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE: ITW) will issue its first quarter 2025 results on Wednesday, April 30, 2025, at 7:00 a.m. CDT. Following the release, ITW will hold its first quarter 2025 earnings webcast at 9:00 a.m. CDT. To access the webcast for the event, please click on the following link:ITW Q1 2025 Earnings Webcast If you are a participant on the conference call, please dial 1-888-660-6652 (domestic) or 1-646-960-0554 (international) 10 mi

headline: Why Illinois Tool Works (ITW) Could Beat Earnings Estimates Again
summary: Illinois Tool Works (ITW) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
